channel.title: LCallDR
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from LCallDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Dems Ratchet Up the Incitement As JB Pritzker Calls for 'Disruption' - Then It Gets Worse
Trump’s border czar tells illegal immigrants they ‘cannot hide from ICE’ amid mass deportation agenda
item.description: Illegal immigrants will not be able to escape U.S. Immigration and Customs Enforcement, President Donald Trump's border czar Tom Homan said Monday.

item.title: SCOOP: Dept of Energy says it saved $700M in Trump's first 100 days by cutting 'wasteful' programs
item.description: During Trump's first 100 days in office, the Energy Department has immediately saved taxpayers $700 million. It is projected that over time the cuts w...

item.title: 'Revenge of the Sith' Theater Re-Release Explodes at the Box Office - People Still Want Real Star Wars
White House: Trump 'Active' in Tariff Negotiations
item.description: President Donald Trump "is now in active negotiations with many" countries subjected to his tariffs, according to a White House statement Monday.

item.title: Trump Blasts 'Fake Polls From Fake News Organizations'
item.description: President Donald Trump has called out liberal media pollsters for pushing anti-Trump narratives aimed at tarnishing his legacy at the 100-day mark.

item.title: US Law Firm Jenner to Ask Court to Block Trump E.O. Barring It
item.description: U.S. law firm Jenner & Block will ask a judge Monday to permanently bar President Donald Trump's executive order punishing the firm for its affiliatio...

item.title: Homan: Texas Military Base Could Be Ready to Hold Migrant Detainees in 'Near Future'
item.description: Texas military base Fort Bliss could be ready "in the very near future" to hold migrant detainees, White House border czar Tom Homan said during a pre...

item.title: White House displays lawn signs highlighting illegal immigrant crime
item.description: The White House displayed yard signs showing the 100 "worst illegal immigrant criminals" arrested during the first 100 days of President Donald Trump'...

item.title: White House touts 100-day illegal immigration crackdown after Biden 'unsecured the border on purpose'
item.description: ICE chief Tom Homan touted a 96% decrease in illegal border crossings under President Donald Trump's administration during a Monday press conference.

item.title: Watch: Leavitt, Homan Detail Powerful Achievements on Illegal Aliens, Reveal Disgusting Move Biden Made
Trump: Biden Admin Prosecutions 'Made Me Stronger'
item.description: President Donald Trump told The Atlantic that being prosecuted by the Biden administration's Justice Department "made me a lot stronger."

item.title: China is Flexing Its Muscle in the Caribbean, and That's a Problem For the United States
Times Square billboard pops up rallying around 'historic' Trump accomplishment during first 100 days
item.description: A billboard in Times Square running this week is praising President Donald Trump for delivering on a key healthcare initiative during his first 100 da...
